sentence.text: To investigate this mechanism, we developed a novel uterine sarcoma tissue-derived orthotopic and metastatic model in KSN establishment of mitotic spindle orientation apoptotic process using a green fluorescent protein stably expressed uterine sarcoma cell line, MES-SA.

Microarray analysis between orthotopic tumors with high and low metastatic potentials revealed differential expression of genes related to cell proliferation and migration (negative regulation of muscle contraction, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, and brain development).

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
